docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Sept. 1--The world population has raced well past the 3,000,000,000 mark and is rushing ahead at an annual rate of increase of 1.8 per cent.

headline.main: World's Population Well Past 3 Billion; WORLD'S PEOPLE EXCEED 3 BILLION

docs.abstract: UN repts world population well past 3 billion and rising 1.8% yrly; highest growth rate in Central Amer and SW Asia, lowest in N and W Eur; other data
docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Sept. 1--The world population has raced well past the 3,000,000,000 mark and is rushing ahead at an annual rate of increase of 1.8 per cent.

byline.original: By KATHLEEN TELTSCH Special to The New York Times
